items.text_target: Eu acordo cedo todas as manhãs.
items.text_native_ref: I wake up early every morning.

items.text_target: Depois do café da manhã, eu vou trabalhar.
items.text_native_ref: After breakfast, I go to work.

items.text_target: À noite, eu assisto televisão antes de dormir.
items.text_native_ref: In the evening, I watch television before going to sleep.

items.text_target: Eu acordo cedo todos os dias.
items.text_native_ref: I wake up early every day.

items.text_target: Depois, eu tomo café da manhã.
À tarde, eu estudo para a escola.
items.text_native_ref: In the afternoon, I study for school.
